short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extension to display Vivino wine score on Majestic wines.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension works with Majestic wines and Vivino, requiring host permissions to access both websites. To use, simply navigate to the Majestic wines search engine and after a few seconds the relevant wines and their ratings, price and region will be displayed in a table on the bottom right of the screen. An example screenshot is shown on the store listing for this extension.

This is an open source Chrome extension, see Github repository: https://github.com/chrisahart/vivino-majestic
